comprehensive_overview: ecCodes is a package developed by the ECMWF which provides an application programming interface and a set of tools for decoding and encoding messages in the following formats: BUFR, CREX, GRIB edition 1 and 2.
core_features: Decoding and encoding of meteorological data
Supports various message formats such as BUFR, CREX, GRIB
Toolset for working with meteorological data
